text: Barbara Joan "Barbra" Streisand (born April 24, 1942) is an American singer, actress, producer, and director. She has won multiple Emmy Awards, Grammy Awards and Golden Globe Awards. Her grandparents on her father's side of the family were from Galicia. (That region is now in Ukraine and Poland.). She is of Jewish descent.Barbra: The Way She Is, Christopher Andersen, 2006 == References == == Other websites == * Category:1942 births Category:Living people Category:American Academy Award winning actors Category:Actors from Brooklyn Category:American movie actors Category:American television producers Category:Emmy Award winning actors Category:Golden Globe Award winning actors Category:Golden Globe Award winning directors Category:American Grammy Award winners Category:Jewish American actors Category:Jewish American musicians Category:Jewish businesspeople Category:Movie directors from New York City Category:Movie producers from New York City Category:Musicians from Brooklyn Category:Singers from New York City
title: Barbra Streisand
